results.title: Randomization Results
results.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one character to accept.
results.charactersExcluded: character(s) have been excluded from future rolls.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize which characters and bosses can be selected in the randomizer

import.title: Import Characters
import.description:
You can use Genshin Kamera to export your characters.
Here you can select the minimum level of the characters you want to import.
import.preview: {x} characters will be imported with current settings.

settings.coopModeWarning: Co-op Mode is enabled: Non-co-op bosses are automatically disabled.

resetConfirm.title: Reset All Settings?
resetConfirm.description: This will reset all settings to their default values. This action cannot be undone.

coopMode.title: Co-op Mode
coopMode.description: Controls whether multiple Travelers with different elements can be selected in a single roll
coopMode.enabled: Rule enabled: Multiple Travelers with different elements can be selected
coopMode.disabled: Rule disabled: Only one Traveler can be selected per roll

fiveStarLimit.title: 5-Star Character Limit
fiveStarLimit.description: Controls the maximum number of 5-star characters that can be selected in a single roll
fiveStarLimit.enabled: Rule enabled: Limit the number of 5-star characters per roll
fiveStarLimit.disabled: Rule disabled: No limit on 5-star characters

notEnoughBosses.title: Not enough bosses available
notEnoughBosses.description: Please enable at least {count} bosses in settings.

notEnoughCharacters.title: Not enough characters available
notEnoughCharacters.description: Could not select enough characters after applying all rules. Consider adjusting your settings.

coopConfirm.title: Disable Non-Co-op Bosses?
coopConfirm.description: Enabling Co-op mode will disable the following bosses:
coopConfirm.note: These bosses will be automatically disabled in your settings.
coopConfirm.question: Do you want to continue?

excluded.title: Excluded Characters
excluded.noCharacters: No characters have been excluded yet. When you accept characters from the randomizer, they will appear here.

wip.title: Under Construction
wip.description: This page is currently under construction. Please check back soon for updates.
